description: Can't catch us! Be like the Snow Yeti™ and go so far out there and bee-line so fast, only the sun in the sky can see you sending. Made for the turn-earners who slash with style and make friends with the trees, this tee is all about riding your own wave of snow. Printed on a mega soft, 100% cotton base, it'll be on your back more often than it makes it to the wash.
name: Mountain Hardwear Snow Yeti LS - Mens
